DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) multiple infusion GS-5745 adult rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) . Participants randomize 4:1 ratio receive 1 intravenous ( IV ) infusion GS-5745 placebo every 2 week , total 3 IV infusion .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics GS-5745 Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
